name: Diagnosis (OdYsseY_98)
description:
Diagnosis is a game designed with the idea of bringing awareness to the difficulty of diagnosing mental diseases.

Hence the title “Diagnosis”

Our game focuses on schizophrenia and the various issues that are related to the disease and the troubles that one may have diagnosing the disease.

The game was inspired by personal experiences of an individual who has been diagnosed with schizophrenia.

Game Created by:

Tayla Roach

Sean Martin

Odysseas Marcandonatos

Jared van Schie
